org.intermine.web.logic.session

Class QueryCountQueryMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.web.logic.query.QueryMonitorTimeout
      • org.intermine.web.logic.session.QueryCountQueryMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryMonitor

    public class QueryCountQueryMonitor
extends QueryMonitorTimeout
    A QueryMonitor that maintains a timeout and is used when counting the number of rows a query returns.
